name: King of the Chill
description:
CONTROLS:

Use W to move forward,  left click to fire projectiles at the enemy.

Freeze all the planets with your projectiles to win!

Once your planet is frozen, you can build buildings on it to defend the planet from being melted by the enemy spaceships.

Collect StarBucks and Shoot presents to craft special items... 

USE RIGHT CLICK to shoot a special projectile once you craft one
